013package org.apache.juneau.assertions;
014
015import java.io.*;
016import java.time.temporal.*;
017import java.util.*;
018import java.util.function.*;
019
020import org.apache.juneau.common.utils.*;
021import org.apache.juneau.cp.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.serializer.*;
024
025/**
026 * Used for fluent assertion calls against dates.
027 *
028 * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
029 * <p class='bjava'>
030 *    <jc>// Validates the response expiration is after the current date.</jc>
031 *    <jv>client</jv>
032 *       .get(<jsf>URL</jsf>)
033 *       .run()
034 *       .assertDateHeader(<js>"Expires"</js>).isAfterNow();
035 * </p>
036 *
037 *
038 * <h5 class='section'>Test Methods:</h5>
039 * <p>
040 * <ul class='javatree'>
041 *    <li class='jc'>{@link FluentDateAssertion}
042 *    <ul class='javatreec'>
043 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentDateAssertion#is(Date,ChronoUnit) is(Date,ChronoUnit)}
044 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentDateAssertion#isAfter(Date) isAfter(Date)}
045 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentDateAssertion#isAfterNow() isAfterNow()}
046 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentDateAssertion#isBefore(Date) isBefore(Date)}
047 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentDateAssertion#isBeforeNow() isBeforeNow()}
048 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentDateAssertion#isBetween(Date,Date) isBetween(Date,Date)}
049 *    </ul>
050 *    <li class='jc'>{@link FluentComparableAssertion}
051 *    <ul class='javatreec'>
052 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentComparableAssertion#isGt(Comparable) isGt(Comparable)}
053 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentComparableAssertion#isGte(Comparable) isGte(Comparable)}
054 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentComparableAssertion#isLt(Comparable) isLt(Comparable)}
055 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentComparableAssertion#isLte(Comparable) isLte(Comparable)}
056 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentComparableAssertion#isBetween(Comparable,Comparable) isBetween(Comparable,Comparable)}
057  *   </ul>
058 *    <li class='jc'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion}
059 *    <ul class='javatreec'>
060 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isExists() isExists()}
061 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#is(Object) is(Object)}
062 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#is(Predicate) is(Predicate)}
063 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isNot(Object) isNot(Object)}
064 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isAny(Object...) isAny(Object...)}
065 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isNotAny(Object...) isNotAny(Object...)}
066 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isNull() isNull()}
067 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isNotNull() isNotNull()}
068 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isString(String) isString(String)}
069 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isJson(String) isJson(String)}
070 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isSame(Object) isSame(Object)}
071 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isSameJsonAs(Object) isSameJsonAs(Object)}
072 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isSameSortedJsonAs(Object) isSameSortedJsonAs(Object)}
073 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isSameSerializedAs(Object, WriterSerializer) isSameSerializedAs(Object, WriterSerializer)}
074 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isType(Class) isType(Class)}
075 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isExactType(Class) isExactType(Class)}
076 *    </ul>
077 * </ul>
078 *
079 * <h5 class='section'>Transform Methods:</h5>
080 * <p>
081 * <ul class='javatree'>
082 *    <li class='jc'>{@link FluentDateAssertion}
083 *    <ul class='javatreec'>
084 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentDateAssertion#asEpochMillis() asEpochMillis()}
085 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentDateAssertion#asEpochSeconds() asEpochSeconds()}
086 *    </ul>
087 *    <li class='jc'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion}
088 *    <ul class='javatreec'>
089 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asString() asString()}
090 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asString(WriterSerializer) asString(WriterSerializer)}
091 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asString(Function) asString(Function)}
092 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asJson() asJson()}
093 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asJsonSorted() asJsonSorted()}
094 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asTransformed(Function) asApplied(Function)}
095 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asAny() asAny()}
096 * </ul>
097 * </ul>
098 *
099 * <h5 class='section'>Configuration Methods:</h5>
100 * <p>
101 * <ul class='javatree'>
102 *    <li class='jc'>{@link Assertion}
103 *    <ul class='javatreec'>
104 *       <li class='jm'>{@link Assertion#setMsg(String, Object...) setMsg(String, Object...)}
105 *       <li class='jm'>{@link Assertion#setOut(PrintStream) setOut(PrintStream)}
106 *       <li class='jm'>{@link Assertion#setSilent() setSilent()}
107 *       <li class='jm'>{@link Assertion#setStdOut() setStdOut()}
108 *       <li class='jm'>{@link Assertion#setThrowable(Class) setThrowable(Class)}
109 *    </ul>
110 * </ul>
111 *
112 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
113 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauEcosystemOverview">Juneau Ecosystem Overview</a>
114 * </ul>
115 *
116 * @param <R> The return type.
117 */
118@FluentSetters(returns="FluentDateAssertion<R>")
119public class FluentDateAssertion<R> extends FluentComparableAssertion<Date,R> {
120
121   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
122   // Static
123   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
124
125   private static final Messages MESSAGES = Messages.of(FluentDateAssertion.class, "Messages");
126   private static final String
127      MSG_unexpectedValue = MESSAGES.getString("unexpectedValue"),
128      MSG_valueWasNotAfterExpected = MESSAGES.getString("valueWasNotAfterExpected"),
129      MSG_valueWasNotBeforeExpected = MESSAGES.getString("valueWasNotBeforeExpected");
130
131   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
132   // Instance
133   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
134
135   /**
136    * Constructor.
137    *
138    * @param value
139    *    The object being tested.
140    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
141    * @param returns
142    *    The object to return after a test method is called.
143    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, the test method returns this object allowing multiple test method calls to be
144    * used on the same assertion.
145    */
146   public FluentDateAssertion(Date value, R returns) {
147      this(null, value, returns);
148   }
149
150   /**
151    * Chained constructor.
152    *
153    * <p>
154    * Used when transforming one assertion into another so that the assertion config can be used by the new assertion.
155    *
156    * @param creator
157    *    The assertion that created this assertion.
158    *    <br>Should be <jk>null</jk> if this is the top-level assertion.
159    * @param value
160    *    The object being tested.
161    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
162    * @param returns
163    *    The object to return after a test method is called.
164    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, the test method returns this object allowing multiple test method calls to be
165    * used on the same assertion.
166    */
167   public FluentDateAssertion(Assertion creator, Date value, R returns) {
168      super(creator, value, returns);
169   }
170
171   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
172   // Transform methods
173   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
174
175   /**
176    * Returns an long assertion on the epoch milliseconds of this date.
177    *
178    * <p>
179    * If the date is <jk>null</jk>, the returned assertion is a null assertion
180    * (meaning {@link FluentLongAssertion#isExists()} returns <jk>false</jk>).
181    *
182    * @return A new assertion.
183    */
184   public FluentLongAssertion<R> asEpochMillis() {
185      return new FluentLongAssertion<>(this, valueIsNull() ? null : value().getTime(), returns());
186   }
187
188   /**
189    * Returns an long assertion on the epoch seconds of this date.
190    *
191    * <p>
192    * If the date is <jk>null</jk>, the returned assertion is a null assertion
193    * (meaning {@link FluentLongAssertion#isExists()} returns <jk>false</jk>).
194    *
195    * @return A new assertion.
196    */
197   public FluentLongAssertion<R> asEpochSeconds() {
198      return new FluentLongAssertion<>(this, valueIsNull() ? null : value().getTime() / 1000, returns());
199   }
200
201   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
202   // Test methods
203   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
204
205   /**
206    * Asserts that the value equals the specified value at the specified precision.
207    *
208    * @param value The value to check against.
209    * @param precision The precision (e.g. {@link ChronoUnit#SECONDS}).
210    * @return The fluent return object.
211    * @throws AssertionError If assertion failed.
212    */
213   public R is(Date value, ChronoUnit precision) throws AssertionError {
214      if (Utils.ne(value(), value, (x,y)->x.toInstant().truncatedTo(precision).equals(y.toInstant().truncatedTo(precision))))
215         throw error(MSG_unexpectedValue, value, value());
216      return returns();
217   }
218
219   /**
220    * Asserts that the value is after the specified value.
221    *
222    * @param value The values to check against.
223    * @return The fluent return object.
224    * @throws AssertionError If assertion failed.
225    */
226   public R isAfter(Date value) throws AssertionError {
227      Utils.assertArgNotNull("value", value);
228      if (! (value().after(value)))
229         throw error(MSG_valueWasNotAfterExpected, value, value());
230      return returns();
231   }
232
233   /**
234    * Asserts that the value is after the current date.
235    *
236    * @return The fluent return object.
237    * @throws AssertionError If assertion failed.
238    */
239   public R isAfterNow() throws AssertionError {
240      return isAfter(new Date());
241   }
242
243   /**
244    * Asserts that the value is before the specified value.
245    *
246    * @param value The values to check against.
247    * @return The fluent return object.
248    * @throws AssertionError If assertion failed.
249    */
250   public R isBefore(Date value) throws AssertionError {
251      Utils.assertArgNotNull("value", value);
252      if (! (value().before(value)))
253         throw error(MSG_valueWasNotBeforeExpected, value, value());
254      return returns();
255   }
256
257   /**
258    * Asserts that the value is before the current date.
259    *
260    * @return The fluent return object.
261    * @throws AssertionError If assertion failed.
262    */
263   public R isBeforeNow() throws AssertionError {
264      return isBefore(new Date());
265   }
266
267   /**
268    * Asserts that the value is between (inclusive) the specified upper and lower values.
269    *
270    * @param lower The lower value to check against.
271    * @param upper The upper value to check against.
272    * @return The fluent return object.
273    * @throws AssertionError If assertion failed.
274    */
275   public R isBetween(Date lower, Date upper) throws AssertionError {
276      isExists();
277      Utils.assertArgNotNull("lower", lower);
278      Utils.assertArgNotNull("upper", upper);
279      isLte(upper);
280      isGte(lower);
281      return returns();
282   }
283
284   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
285   // Fluent setters
286   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
287
288   // <FluentSetters>
289
290   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion */
291   public FluentDateAssertion<R> setMsg(String msg, Object...args) {
292      super.setMsg(msg, args);
293      return this;
294   }
295
296   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion */
297   public FluentDateAssertion<R> setOut(PrintStream value) {
298      super.setOut(value);
299      return this;
300   }
301
302   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion */
303   public FluentDateAssertion<R> setSilent() {
304      super.setSilent();
305      return this;
306   }
307
308   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion */
309   public FluentDateAssertion<R> setStdOut() {
310      super.setStdOut();
311      return this;
312   }
313
314   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion */
315   public FluentDateAssertion<R> setThrowable(Class<? extends java.lang.RuntimeException> value) {
316      super.setThrowable(value);
317      return this;
318   }
319
320   // </FluentSetters>
321}
